WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue has reached 60 days without response. If this is still an issue, please resubmit with reference to the currently affected versions and any necessary files.
WorkItem.Description: When the Grand Spellstone buff is applied, it removes the DPS from (at least) the Lifespark Visage and Valorous Plagueheart Circlet ... but not Faerlina's Madness. Other helms are affected, per the screenshot attached. Error found in both 2.2.5 and 2.2.6.
